original_text: And when the flame went up toward heaven from the altar, the angel of the Lord went up in the flame of the altar. Now Manoah and his wife were watching, and they fell on their faces to the ground.
korean_text: 불꽃이 제단에서부터 하늘로 올라가는 동시에 여호와의 사자가 제단 불꽃에 휩싸여 올라간지라 마노아와 그의 아내가 그것을 보고 그들의 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드리니라

sentences.original_text: And when the flame went up toward heaven
the angel of the Lord went up
in the flame of the altar
Now Manoah and his wife were watching
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 마노아와 그의 아내는 보고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and they fell on their faces
